document_data.name: Shal
document_data.mainbody: '''Shal''' was a [[succubus]] posing as the female [[duergar]] consort of Deepking [[Horgar Steelshadow V]] in [[Gracklstugh]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationships: Shal was loyal to the [[demon lord]] [[Graz'zt]], whom she served.
document_data.History: Her only mission was to hide the madness that had infected the Deepking ''circa'' [[1486 DR]]. She may have been exposed by an adventuring party that had escaped [[Velkynvelve]].
document_data.Description: She wore a gown made entirely of [[gold]] coins that was valued at 750 [[gp]] and weighed {{SI|75|lb|k|long=yes}}.
